H0.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. Mongolia

H1.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. Bhutan

H2.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. Nepal

H3.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. 臺灣

A4.text: The PRC's One China principle states that Taiwan and mainland China are both part of China, and that the PRC is the only legitimate government of China.

A5.text: The ROC recognized Mongolia as an independent country in 1946 after signing the 1945 Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance, but after retreating to Taiwan in 1949 it reneged to preserve its claim over mainland China.
